item.title: 麦可森将以 24.9 亿美元收购佛罗里达癌症连锁店股份
item.description: McKesson 公司同意收购一家私营诊所运营商佛罗里达癌症专科& 研究所旗下分支机构的控股权。【原文：McKesson Corp. agreed to buy a controlling stake in an arm of Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute, a privately held operator of clinics.】

item.title: 勒庞拒绝左翼总理，法国等待马克龙的人选
item.description: 法国极右翼国民联盟领导人玛丽娜-勒庞告诉埃马纽埃尔-马克龙，她的团体将反对左翼新人民阵线联盟的总理人选，因为马克龙总统正在努力物色一位能够在议会分裂的情况下执政的候选人。【原文：French far-right National Rally leader Marine Le Pen told Emmanuel Macron her group would oppose a prime minister from the leftist New Popular Front alliance as the president seeks to identify a candidate able to govern with a divided parliament.】

item.title: 加拿大将限制低工资外籍劳工入境
item.description: 加拿大将限制企业使用一项允许企业招聘低工资外国劳工的计划，因为该计划的规模急剧扩大，引发了欺诈和滥用指控。【原文：Canada will restrict businesses’ access to a program that allows them to recruit low-wage foreign labor after it exploded in size, spurring allegations of fraud and abuse.】

item.title: 新一代 ETF 摆脱先锋效应，收费接近十年新高
item.description: 超低成本的被动式 ETF 大受欢迎，推动了基金管理领域的惊人转变：新进入者的价格越来越高。【原文：The popularity of ultra-low cost passive ETFs is fueling a surprise shift in fund management: New entrants are getting pricier.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "钻井-婴儿-钻井 "誓言与其说是政策，不如说是伦理
item.description:
石油公司高管对大幅提高产量兴趣不大。【原文：

Oil executives have little appetite to dramatically boost output.

】

item.title: 美联储减息预期提振风险资产，新兴市场股市上涨
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出美国将从下月开始降息的信号后，新兴股市在中国科技蓝筹股的带动下恢复上涨。【原文：Emerging stocks resumed their advance, led by Chinese tech blue-chips, after Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell signaled that US interest rates would be reduced starting from next month.】

item.title: 波兰搜寻进入其领空的俄罗斯无人机
item.description: 波兰军队已开始搜寻在俄罗斯攻击邻国乌克兰期间进入其领空的无人驾驶飞行物。【原文：The Polish Army has started a search operation for an unmanned flying object that entered its airspace during Russia’s attack against neighboring Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国石油钻井业绩强劲，上半年创历史新高
item.description: 中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：PetroChina Co. posted record earnings for the first half of the year as high drilling output and strong oil prices helped it weather weakening fuel demand in China.】

item.title: 加拿大将对中国电动汽车和钢铁征收关税
item.description: 加拿大将对中国制造的电动汽车、铝和钢材征收新的关税，站在西方盟国一边，采取措施保护国内制造商。【原文：Canada will impose new tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles, aluminum and steel, lining up behind western allies and taking steps to protect domestic manufacturers.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 本周伊始，交易员在中东紧张局势加剧的预期、美国明确降息信号对债券的支撑以及波音公司投资者为其后果做好准备的情况下表现谨慎。市场动态如下。【原文：Traders start the week cautiously in anticipation of more Middle East tensions, a clear US rate-cut signal supports bonds and Boeing investors brace for fallout. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 美国石油主导地位取决于新墨西哥州的宁静一角
item.description:
挑战 "欧佩克+"全球影响力的关键在于美国西南部的一小块地区，那里的钻井成本很高，而且大部分燃烧都是非法的。【原文：

The key to challenging the global influence of OPEC+ is a small swath of the American Southwest where drilling costs are high and most flaring is illegal.

】

item.title: 阿克尔-英国石油公司（Aker BP）称挪威石油产量与可再生能源发展齐头并进
item.description: 挪威第二大石油和天然气公司负责人表示，挪威必须提供更多的油气勘探区，并扩大该国新兴的可再生能源部门，以保护国内零部件和服务供应商。【原文：Norway must make more area available for hydrocarbon exploration and scale up the country’s nascent renewable sector in order to protect domestic suppliers of parts and services, according to the head of the country’s second biggest oil and gas company.】

item.title: 利比亚敌对政府将在中央银行争论中停止石油产出
item.description: 利比亚东部政府在的黎波里的竞争对手取代中央银行领导层后，宣布停止所有石油生产和出口。【原文：Libya’s eastern government announced the stoppage of all oil production and export after its Tripoli-based rival moved to replace the leadership of the central bank.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金为 CIP 可再生能源基金拨款 9 亿欧元
item.description: 挪威1.7万亿美元的主权财富基金承诺向哥本哈根基础设施合伙公司（Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners）的第五个旗舰基金投资9亿欧元（10亿美元），这是该基金首次间接参股其未上市的可再生能源基础设施投资组合。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund committed to invest €900 million ($1 billion) in Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners’ fifth flagship fund, the first time it will take an indirect stake for its unlisted renewable energy infrastructure portfolio.】

item.title: 印度港口工会和官员将举行会议试图避免罢工
item.description: 印度国营港口的工会代表预计将于周二会见政府官员，为避免计划于次日举行的罢工做最后的努力。【原文：Union representatives from India’s state-run ports are expected to meet government officials on Tuesday in a last-ditch attempt to stave off strikes planned for the following day.】

item.title: 危险的先例 "震撼智利可再生能源市场
item.description: 智利的一项激励计划吸引了贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）和摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A legislative change is threatening to unravel one of the world’s safest bets in renewable energy, a Chilean incentive program that lured companies backed by BlackRock Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "美国制造 "比特币威胁中国巨头比特大陆的统治
item.description: 多年来，一家中国公司一直占据着加密货币领域利润最丰厚的一角。日益紧张的政治局势和唐纳德-特朗普重掌白宫的前景，对这一统治构成了前所未有的威胁。【原文：For years, a Chinese company has dominated one of the most lucrative corners of the cryptocurrency universe. Rising political tensions, and the prospect of Donald Trump retaking the White House, pose an unprecedented threat to that reign.】

item.title: 鼎泰丰因消费疲软关闭中国分店
item.description: 台湾饺子连锁店鼎泰丰将关闭在中国大陆的十多家门店，在中国大陆市场，餐馆之间为吸引日益节俭的中国消费者而展开了残酷的价格战。【原文：Taiwanese dumpling chain Din Tai Fung will close more than a dozen stores in mainland China, a market that’s seen a brutal price war among restaurants to lure increasingly frugal Chinese consumers.】

item.title: 新监管审查报告发布后 Paytm 股价下跌
item.description: 有报道称，印度市场监管部门要求Paytm提供更多与其首次公开募股相关的信息，这可能会加剧这家金融科技先驱企业的监管问题，随后Paytm股价下跌。【原文：Shares of Paytm dropped after a report that India’s markets watchdog asked it for more information related to its initial public offering, potentially exacerbating the fintech pioneer’s regulatory problems.】

item.title: 刚果反对将特拉菲古拉（Trafigura）支持的 Chemaf 公司出售给中国矿商
item.description: 刚果民主共和国表示反对将特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）支持的矿商 Chemaf Resources Ltd.出售给中国的诺林矿业有限公司（Norin Mining Ltd.）。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo signaled that it opposes the sale of Trafigura Group-backed miner Chemaf Resources Ltd. to China’s Norin Mining Ltd.】

item.title: 瑞典央行警告瑞典银行仍易受财产风险影响
item.description: 根据瑞典央行本月早些时候的政策会议纪要，瑞典的主要银行因其对 "高负债房地产公司 "的风险敞口而对金融体系构成脆弱性。【原文：Sweden’s major banks pose a vulnerability to the financial system due to their exposure to “highly-indebted property companies,” according to minutes from the Riksbank’s policy meeting earlier this month.】

item.title: 马来西亚国家石油公司就废弃油田起诉南苏丹
item.description: 马来西亚石油天然气巨头马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.【原文：A unit of Malaysian oil and gas giant Petroliam Nasional Bhd. sued South Sudan for allegedly blocking a sale of its assets for $1.25 billion and instead taking over that business.】

item.title: 瑞典央行会议记录显示大幅削减关键利率的门槛很高
item.description: 瑞典央行官员在上周的会议上讨论了将借贷成本降低半个基点的方案，当时他们选择将基准利率下调 25 个基点。【原文：Officials at Sweden’s Riksbank discussed the option of a half-point reduction in borrowing costs at their meeting last week when they opted to cut the benchmark rate by 25 basis points.】

item.title: 日本市场情绪回暖，巨型房源上市将提振日本市场
item.description: 随着日本股市从本月的大跌中反弹，两家巨型公司的首次公开募股可能会使日本股市今年的融资额增加两倍左右。【原文：Two jumbo initial public offerings may roughly triple the amount of money raised in Japan’s stock market this year as sentiment bounces back from this month’s selloff.】

item.title: 德国经济 "陷入危机 "制约商业前景
item.description: 德国的商业前景保持在 2 月份以来的最低水平；这凸显了欧洲最大经济体在年初的反弹嘎然而止后再次被阴霾所笼罩。【原文：Germany’s business outlook held at its lowest level since February — highlighting the gloom once again engulfing Europe’s biggest economy after an early-year rebound fizzled out.】

item.title: 在杰克逊霍尔担任美联储主席的感受
item.description:
里士满联储汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）谈今年最大的经济事件之一。【原文：

The Richmond Fed’s Tom Barkin on one of the biggest economic events of the year.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老金因 Pluralsight 重组而受到冲击
item.description: 在私人信贷机构同意收购美国教育软件公司 Pluralsight Inc.【原文：AustralianSuper, the country’s largest pension, has written down its investment in US education software firm Pluralsight Inc. after private credit lenders agreed to take ownership of the company.】

item.title: 欧洲股市开盘低迷，成交量清淡，英国放假
item.description: 周一，由于英国因国庆节休市，欧洲股市在成交量清淡的情况下结束了连续三天的上涨。【原文：European stocks snapped a three-day streak of gains on Monday amid light volumes with the UK market closed for a national holiday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔将与科威特签署为期 15 年的液化天然气供应新协议
item.description: 卡塔尔将与科威特签署一项为期 15 年的液化天然气销售新协议，这是卡塔尔签署的第二份供应协议，将有助于缓解今年夏天被迫削减产量的发电厂的压力。【原文：Qatar will sign a new deal for liquefied natural gas sales to Kuwait for 15 years, it’s second supply deal that will help ease the strain on power plants that have already been forced to cut output this summer.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔强化反弹押注，黄金多头欢欣鼓舞
item.description: 随着美联储准备降息、收益率下降等传统驱动因素卷土重来，以及西方投资者的重新涌入，黄金突破每盎司2,500美元的创纪录涨势似乎还有待继续。【原文：Gold’s record-setting rally above $2,500 an ounce looks to have further to run as the Federal Reserve prepares to chop rates, traditional drivers such as lower yields return, and Western investors pile back in.】
